title: Hello Dribbble - Synerg'hetic
description: An Hello Dribbble animation with the new graphic charter of Synerg'hetic.

title: Recrutment Campaign - Synerg'hetic
description: One of the three motion videos made for the recruitment campaign of Synerg'hetic, a Junior-Enterprise.

title: Showreel - Experiments
description: A showreel made from various experiments with After Effects and 3ds Max.

title: Aftermovie - Synerg'hetic
description: One of the multiple aftermovies made for Synerg'hetic, as they frequently organize talks with influent professionals from the tech industry.

title: Transports Solid'ères - Landing Animation
description: A short animation made for the landing page of a school project called Transports Solid'ères.

title: Brand's Logo Animation - Synerg'hetic
description: The animated Synerg'hetic logo following the rebrand of the Junior-Enterprise.

title: Hello Dribbble
description: An Hello Dribbble animation made for a friend.

title: The History Machine - Webdoc
description: A web documentary developed in 2 days for an intensive week project, questioning the human/machine relationship's evolution since their creation.

title: Transports Solid'ère - Data Journalism
description: A website made for a school project during an intensive week focused on data journalism. We chose to talk about the physical isolation of some population in France.

title: Major Tom - WebGL Experience
description: A WebGL experience made during a weekend, using imported models, Three.JS and Physi.JS for collisions. The collisions are neither good or bad, at least they're working! Still love the result, considering the time I had.

title: Z'Bar Wars - Pub Crawl
description: A pub crawl website for mobile made for an school project focused on APIs and PHP. It cost us some sleepless nights, but it was a really fun and challenging project! Cheers!

title: Cube Invaders - Canvas Experience
description: A game made in a week using Javascript and Canvas for a development course. Random ennemies position, size and movement, random colors, collision detection, the game has cool features.

title: Sci-Fi UI
description: A fake Sci-Fi control panel made for a development course, using CSS animations.

title: Midl - JS Casual Game
description: A game made during an intensive week of my first year at Hetic. It was the first time I used Javascript for a project.

title: Police Roadblock
description: A night animation modeled and animated for an error page during my internship at Trusk.

title: Gas Station
description: A low poly 3D animation made as a Blender training.

title: Truck Tunnel
description: Another animation modeled and animated for an error page during my internship at Trusk.

title: Truck Garage
description: Another animation modeled and animated for an error page during my internship at Trusk.

title: Hello Dribbble
description: A low poly 3D animation made for my Hello Dribbble shot using Cinema4D.

title: Fake Brand Showroom
description: A showroom video made for a fake brand created for a communication course.

title: Cartier Champs-Élysées
description: A 3D animation of the Cartier showroom located in the Champs-Élysées, created for a communication course.

title: Airbnb Weekends
description: A complete flow for an all-in-one weekend booking app made for a design course.

title: Petters - Animal Dating App
description: The mockups of an Android Tinder-Like app for animals, that we've then developed using Kotlin.

title: Z'Bar Wars - Pub Crawl
description: The mockups of a pub crawl website for mobile made for a school project. It was rush but also a lot of fun!
